1_1yq6ABe15TborB8sGQb1pGcZgUd6eu3WJ.body:
The domain registry used is namecoin, "a decentralized open source information registration and transfer system based on the Bitcoin cryptocurrency." read some more at https://namecoin.info/

Basically, without having your private key, they can't censor your domain out of the domain registry.

14_1PvAyLAB5H1JKbiFjx95ZJXrNJVyWxs5Hf.body: I was linked to the torrentfreak article from hacker news (https://news.ycombinator.com).
